title: The Hobbit, or There and Back Again...
subtitle: Interactive journey through Middle-earth with artificial intelligence
startGameHint: Your adventure will begin in the cozy hobbit-hole of Bag End...
confirmNewGame: Are you sure you want to start a new game? Current progress will be lost.

what.title: What is this game?
what.description1: You control Bilbo Baggins on his incredible journey through Tolkien's world. Artificial intelligence serves as the game master, creating living dialogues and character reactions in the style of the great writer.
what.description2: Every action you take affects the story. The world remembers your deeds, characters develop, and time flows realistically. This isn't just a game ‚Äî it's a living story that you write together with AI.

will.title: Will system
will.description: Bilbo's will affects his behavior. Brave deeds strengthen will, cowardice weakens it.

time.title: Living time
time.description: Time flows realistically: conversations take minutes, journeys take days, rest takes entire seasons.

memory.title: World memory
memory.description: Characters remember your deeds, the world develops, and important events are preserved forever.
